component.text: In this activity determine if the scenario is describing a manual update, a prompt for permission update, or an automatic update.
Drag each scenario to the installation method that is described.
A user is notified that a new update is available, but decides not to install it based on reports of poor computer performance after installation.
A service pack update is required to correct known functionality and security issues within an operating system.
A computer automatically accesses a manufacture's web site nightly to check for any OS updates to install.

You have correctly matched scenarios to their installation methods.
